scripts.build:main: mkdir -p scripts && rollup -i ./_scripts/main.js -o ./scripts/main.js -c -m && cd scripts && uglifyjs --source-map main.min.js.map -m --screw-ie8 main.js -o main.min.js && wc -c main.min.js
scripts.watch: ./parallel.sh "nodemon --watch ./_scripts -e js --exec npm run build:js" "nodemon --watch ./client/styles -e scss --exec npm run build:styles" "nodemon --watch ./client -e css,html,png,json --exec npm run build:other"
scripts.build: ./parallel.sh "npm run build:other" "npm run build:js" "npm run build:styles"
